6.eng-name: The Book of the Times (of Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Khabbab said:"We complained to the Messenger of Alalh (ﷺ) about how hot the sand was, but he did not respond to our complaint." It was said to Abu Ishaq (one of the narrators): "Did they complain regarding his praying it early?" He said: "Yes

chapter.eng-name: The Beginning Of The Time For Zuhr
